roleset.name: mess up, botch
roleset.note: BUNGLE-V NOTES: Wow, some things never change. (from bungle.01-v)

example.name: bungle bungle bungle
example.text: Intelligence Committee Chairman David Boren (D., Okla.) and Vice Chairman William Cohen (R., Maine), for their part, angrily accused the White House of selectively leaking classified documents and trying unfairly to shift the blame to Congress for the bungled attempt [*] to topple Gen. Noriega.
